Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of entitlement from the technology and design sector - "come up here, we'll fix that." The Dutch are deeply offended. The US feels alienated by Dutch indecision. The Dutch feel that they accept change in time.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too.
